location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no. 1681 of 1822 from Secretary to Government of Bombay to Lieutenant John MacLeod, Resident in the Persian Gulph [Gulf]

mods.abstract: Encloses copy of a letter from Colonel Kennett, Political Agent at Kishm, dated 19 October 1822, reporting his endeavours to adjust the claims of Ramah bin Jubbur [Raḥmah bin Jābir] and the ‘Abdullāh bin Aḥmad Āl Khalīfah, the Shaikh of Bahrein [Bahrain]. The letter includes 'Notes of conferences between Lieutenant Colonel Kennett, the Shaik of Bahrein and Rahmah bin Jabber', dated 8-12 August 1822, and 'Translation of an agreement made by Rahmah ben Jabber' at Bussadore [Basidū], dated August 1822.
